# Boat Service for Scattering Ashes (Paak Ao) - Context for AI

## Project Overview
Website: https://www.เรือลอยอังคารปากอ่าว.com (xn--12cfi5f6afdmy6cbbf4crcc9ezi0g.com)
Type: Service Business (Boat Rental & Ceremony)
Location: Wat Bang Nang Kreng, Samut Prakan, Thailand
Target Audience: Families seeking Buddhist funeral services for scattering ashes.

## Core Services
1. Boat Rental:
   - Sizes: 12, 17, 20, 30, and 50 seats.
   - Safety: Big boats, life jackets included.
2. Ceremony Assistance:
   - Staff provided to conduct the ritual.
   - Fresh flowers and biodegradable floating urns (Loong) provided.

## Key Entities & Keywords
- "ลอยอังคาร" (Scattering Ashes)
- "ปากอ่าวแม่น้ำเจ้าพระยา" (Chao Phraya River Mouth)
- "วัดบางนางเกรง" (Wat Bang Nang Kreng - Pier location)
- "สมุทรปราการ" (Samut Prakan)

## Contact Information
- Phone: 083-271-5911 (Ple), 087-074-9721 (Pui)
- Service Area: Samut Prakan, Bangkok vicinities.

## Technical Context
- Platform: WordPress
- SEO Strategy: Content marketing on "Loi Angkhan" rituals, localized SEO.
